name: Island Royale
description:
You and your fellow passengers have crashed near a deserted island. Some of you manage to swim to the island (16 of you). There is nothing in the island left to do, so you decide to spend your last hours playing a deadly game: see who is the one to last!!!

Island Royale is a 2D Battle Royale game prototype made for Mini Jam 50: Islands.

Play with your mouse!

  • Right-click on the spot you want to move to.
  • Left-click to pick up anything on the floor.
  • Left-click again to throw that object at an enemy.

Beware, you need to stay within the safe zones! Safe zones will gradually become smaller and be marked with a red circle. If you are outside the safe zone, your health will decrease! Get inside the circles fast!

Tip: if you are outside the safe zone. you can look at the small bar below your healthbar to check how far away from the circle you are.

Try to beat everyone and die last!

---

Why is this a prototype?  This game currently has a very rudimentary (random) AI (yet). The AI will not attack you for the moment or do any special stuff - it is currently only randomly moving in order to test the mechanics. Apart from that, there are many bugs to fix and additions to be made in the near future.

If you ever get stuck or want to restart the game, simply press F1.
